pullRequest.title: Retention policy should be respected when there is no traffic
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add a new feature:
Retention policy should be respected when there is no traffic #6655

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1 from apache/master

merge
Retention policy should be respected when there is no traffic(#6655)

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -346,6 +346,10 @@ maxMessagePublishBufferSizeInMB=
 # Use 0 or negative number to disable the max publish buffer limiting.
 messagePublishBufferCheckIntervalInMillis=100
 
+# Check between intervals to see if consumed ledgers need to be trimmed
+# Use 0 or negative number to disable the check
+consumedLedgersCheckIntervalInSeconds=120

nodes.bodyText: close the producer at the end. or add @Cleanup annotation.
why not just call the synchronous send?
why do we sleep 4 seconds here?
nit: Ideally we should try to avoid using sleep as the condition to wait until the task to be triggered. we might need to consider how to do this better in the future.

commit.message: change parameter name and add annotations
